block.p: To The Editor: You featured an article about a famous musician from Iowa, Meredith Willson (''Out on the Prairie, a Real River City'' July 2). However, another great musician was also born in Iowa, Glenn Miller. His birthplace in Clarinda is now a museum, and every year on the second weekend of June the birthplace society sponsors a Glenn Miller Festival.

To The Editor: You featured an article about a famous musician from Iowa, Meredith Willson (''Out on the Prairie, a Real River City'' July 2). However, another great musician was also born in Iowa, Glenn Miller. His birthplace in Clarinda is now a museum, and every year on the second weekend of June the birthplace society sponsors a Glenn Miller Festival.

Having attended one several years ago, I must say it attracts not only many people formerly associated with Miller but also great performers. The society is at 107 East Main Street, Clarinda, Iowa 51632; (712) 542-2461.
